sentence.Network_en: The sentence ` He is dead and I alive'contains an ellipsis, ie of the word ` am '.
sentence.Network_cn: 在Heisdead andI alive 一句中有一处省略, 即am这个词.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 省略(ellipsis)指的是把语言结构中的某个成分省去不提。省略是为了避免重复，突出主要信息，使语篇前后衔接，结构紧凑(李运兴，20…

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: via Latin from Greek elleipsis, from elleipein 'leave out'

entry.def: In linguistics, ellipsis means leaving out words rather than repeating them unnecessarily; for example, saying 'I want to go but I can't' instead of 'I want to go but I can't go'.

means.word_mean: 1. omission or suppression of parts of words or sentences
